rows.label: qev018101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, there. Yes, you. With the face. What do you say
to the idea of a specialized combat field, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Say...an atmospheric charge that hastens Skell fuel
recovery, for example. Does that sound convenient?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that it sounds very convenient.

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0020
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0021
rows.name: Snicker. Then snicker again, only louder.

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah, yes. It sounds like a BLADE's dream come true,
doesn't it? And yet, it's REAL![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ha! You think I'm a dreamer, don't you?
Well, I'm the man who made that dream come TRUE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0005
rows.name:
I call it the battle probe! Invented it while I was aboard
the White Whale, you see, so I don't actually have any
completed units on me. But I can explain the premise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Essentially, this new type of data probe takes the
electromagnetic field generated by FrontierNav and
induces a dynamic conversion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0007
rows.name:
The resulting charge infuses the area around the probe,
producing one of many potential types of specialized
combat fields.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm sure you want to see it in action, right?
Probably can't wait to get your little BLADE hands on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I tell you, once this thing takes off with the BLADEs,
it will revolutionize frontline combat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0030
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Hugo that you're impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0040
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you don't need fancy toys to kick ass.

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0010
rows.name:
No doubt you are! And in that case, I'd like to ask you
for a favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Spoken like a [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]who hasn't seen a battle probe
in action yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Try it once and you'll never want to fight without one!
So do yourself a favor and hear me out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0013
rows.name: My design calls for a large quantity of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0014
rows.name:
I've been running around the city begging, but every
factory and lab is scrambling for the stuff, and no one
can see past their greed to the genius of my idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0015
rows.name:
So myopic! How can you overlook a game changer like
this just to produce more of the same boring dreck?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0016
rows.name:
Anyway, this is where you come in.
I need you to secure me 10,000 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Your reward will be a shiny new battle probe!
A bargain and a half, if I do say so myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Perfect. Good. Excellent.
Now get me that miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0019
rows.name:
It's time to give form to this stroke of genius that struck
me as we were striking Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0020
rows.name:
The idiots running New LA's industries were too
wrapped up in their own tired products to see the
genius in my designs, but I'll show them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0021
rows.name:
They'll be kicking themselves when they see every BLADE
in the city beating down my front door![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0022
rows.name:
All I need is that miranium to put it together,
and I'll have a battle probe in your hands.
So don't keep me waiting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0023
rows.name: Well? Got that miranium yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Come on, then! The battle probe is aching to be born!
Straining! It's pushing forth and...
Yes, well. End of metaphor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0050
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0051
rows.name: Hand over 10,000 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_JNK0060
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev018101_SEL0061
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0025
rows.name: Yes... Yeeeeeeees![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0026
rows.name: Wait right there. I'll have it ready momentarily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0027
rows.name: ...It's done! It's finally done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Presenting the first of hopefully many different kinds of
battle probesâ€”the fuel recovery probe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Set this baby at a FrontierNav data probe site and any
Skells parked in that whole region will recover fuel at
an accelerated rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Go on, take it. It's yours. Just promise to get out there
and show the world that my inventions are more useful
than any weapon those arms manufacturers crank out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, and uh, protect the welfare of all New LA's citizens
as well. I guess that's important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Meanwhile, I have more kinds of battle probes to
prototype. In fact, I've got a whole STACK of designs
just waiting for my eureka touch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Come back and see me again, all right?
I can't see my designs implemented without help
from BLADEs like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Huh? And what exactly are you waiting for?
A fanfare of trumpets? A gilded invitation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018101_MSG0035
rows.name: Give me the stuff and let me get to work already![ST:wait ]
